com.turnout.ws.controller

Class StudioActivityController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.StudioActivityController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class StudioActivityController
extends java.lang.Object
    StudioActivityController class is front face for accessing and manipulating studios activity(challenges and events) related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. Basic CRUD operation is done like update, retrieve and add.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      An injectable constructor with two dependencies as argument.

    • Method Detail

      • getListedActivity

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/activity/events/{pageno}/{pagesize}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray getListedActivity(@PathParam(value="pageno")
                                                                         int pageno,
                                                                         @PathParam(value="pagesize")
                                                                         int pagesize)
        This method used to get all the active events from the database.
        Parameters:
        pageno - current page number.
        pagesize - Total number of records shown in current page.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the events details.

      • getEventDetails

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="getActivityDetail/activityid/{activityid}/{partyid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getEventDetails(@PathParam(value="activityid")
                                                                        int activityid,
                                                                        @PathParam(value="partyid")
                                                                        int partyid)
        This method used to get event details from database based on the activity id passing.
        Parameters:
        activityid - An unique studio activity id.
        partyid - An unique id of party.
        Returns:
        JSONObject It will contains specific event details.

      • saveStudioActivity

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@POST
@Path(value="/saveStudioActivity")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveStudioActivity(org.json.simple.JSONObject studio)
                                              throws java.text.ParseException
        This function used to save events and challenges into database. It will return just added or updated studio activity id.
        Parameters:
        studio - Its unique id of studio.
        Returns:
        Returns inserted or updated row id.
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - It throws when unexpected error happened while parsing text.

      • getChallengeWall

        @RolesAllowed(value="USER")
@GET
@Path(value="/challengeWall/activityid/{activityid}/{partyid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getChallengeWall(@PathParam(value="activityid")
                                                                         int activityid,
                                                                         @PathParam(value="partyid")
                                                                         int partyid)
        In this method we will get the challenge details from the database based on activity id passing.
        Parameters:
        activityid - An unique id of studio activity
        partyid - An unique id of party.
        Returns:
        Return JSONObject contains challenge details.

      • activitySearch

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@GET
@Path(value="/activitySearch/name/{name}/status/{status}/type/{type}/stdid/{stdid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray activitySearch(@PathParam(value="name")
                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                      @PathParam(value="status")
                                                                      java.lang.String status,
                                                                      @PathParam(value="type")
                                                                      int type,
                                                                      @PathParam(value="stdid")
                                                                      int stdid)
        This method used to get all the activity from database and helps to search the activities based on passed string.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the events/challenge.
        status - Activity status
        type - which studio activity need to show
        stdid - An unique id of studio.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONArray contains all the studio activity details.

        Returns:
        Return JSONObject contains challenge details.
